original_title: 2 Dead in Akuressa following strong winds
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Two lives were lost in Akuressa when a tree uprooted and fell onto a garage. This was due to powerful winds experienced in the area on Saturday (22) morning.

The incident left five others injured, with one person succumbing to injuries at the scene. Those injured were promptly hospitalised and another victim succumbed to their injuries at the time. The deceased were aged 28 and 65 and were residents of the Akuressa area.
“We supported Ranil to stabilize the economy and establish democracy.” – SLPP General Secretary
